title: Feature Request : Hierarchical Softmax implementation using Tensorflow
body_html:
I am trying to multi-level classify with Hierarchical Softmax by using Tensorflow. But I could find any existing HS implementation in Tensorflow.

Is there any other way to implement HS using tensorflow?

It would be helpful if Hierarchical Softmax support is given in TF.
